name: get_second_opinion
description: Get comprehensive multi-model AI feedback on code, design decisions, or bug analysis. Consults 5 AI models (Cerebras, Gemini, Perplexity, OpenAI, Grok) and provides synthesized recommendations with industry sources. Requires authentication via auth-cli.mjs login.

feedback_type.description: Type of feedback to request: 'design' for architecture review, 'code-review' for code quality, 'bugs' for bug investigation, 'all' for comprehensive analysis

question.description: Specific question or context for the second opinion. If not provided, uses default prompts based on feedback_type.
